title: [Tower Hill, Path]
description: A few brittle, dry leaves cling to the branches of several hawthorn trees.  The trees themselves are twisted and bent, yet have established a solid roothold along the rocky hillside.  The vast array of stars above is partially blocked by an outthrust ledge further up the hillside.

A few brittle, dry leaves cling to the branches of several hawthorn trees.  The trees themselves are twisted and bent, yet have established a solid roothold along the rocky hillside.  Sunlight glints off the edge of a stony ledge further up the hillside.
